org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.cache

Class GridCacheMvccManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.cache.GridCacheSharedManagerAdapter
      • org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.cache.GridCacheMvccManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GridCacheSharedManager

    public class GridCacheMvccManager
extends GridCacheSharedManagerAdapter
    Manages lock order within a thread.

    • Field Detail

      • THREAD_RESERVE_SIZE

        protected static final int THREAD_RESERVE_SIZE
        Maxim number of atomic IDs for thread. Must be power of two!
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        protected final AtomicLong globalAtomicCnt
        Global atomic id counter.

      • isLockedByThread

        public boolean isLockedByThread(IgniteTxKey key,
                                long threadId)
        Checks if given key is locked by thread with given id or any thread.
        Parameters:
        key - Key to check.
        threadId - Thread id. If -1, all threads will be checked.
        Returns:
        True if locked by any or given thread (depending on threadId value).

public GridCacheMvccCandidate explicitLock(long threadId,

        Parameters:
